reviews.content: I always thought that because Sonny Hayes was a gambler and lost control of his fortune and purpose, the deck every time he drew a card before a race was representing him taking his life back into his own hands. It also might have been a connection to his father who he lost at 13.
reviews.author: BitIllustrious4919

reviews.content:
Field Van was formerly Sportsmobile West before they rebranded in 2020. The West location was founded almost 20 years after this van was manufactured by Sportsmobile. Sportsmobile developed their own 4x4 system in the 1990s which was produced mainly at the West location but they originally used the Pathfinder 4x4 system in the older model econolines like this one. 
[https://sportsmobile.com/experience/](https://sportsmobile.com/experience/)
